end fb1.Name: Kai
end fb1.Text: Are you alright? You look a bit pale.

end fb1.Name: Elm
end fb1.Text: I'm fine. Just a bit dizzy.

end fb1.Name: Elm
end fb1.Text: About your knife -- did you ever check outside your house, by any chance? On the left.

end fb1.Name: Kai
end fb1.Text: I guess I haven't checked there yet, though. It's worth a shot.

end fb1.Name: Kai
end fb1.Text: Come on! Maybe some fresh air will help you feel a bit better.

end fb2.Name: Elm
end fb2.Text: (Ugh. Those trips aren't good for my stomach.)

end fb2.Name: Elm
end fb2.Text: (Who were those weird people in that flashback? Kai and some woman.)

end fb2.Name: Elm
end fb2.Text: (And then there were those other two. I couldn't see them, and I couldn't hear their voices all too well... only what they were saying.)

end fb2.Name: Hank
end fb2.Text: Are you okay, friend??? Do you want some milk????

end fb2.Name: Elm
end fb2.Text: (His loud voice is actually kind of grounding.)

end fb2.Name: Elm
end fb2.Text: Hank, have you checked near the village entrance?

end fb2.Name: Kai
end fb2.Text: Another one of your cryptic intuitions?

end fb3.Name: Elm
end fb3.Text: (Oof. I feel better than last time, but I still feel like I just got sucker-punched in the gut.)

end fb3.Name: Elm
end fb3.Text: (That aside -- who is Phoenix? That's the only name I've gotten from these cryptic flashbacks.)

end fb3.Name: Kai
end fb3.Text: Ah! The Elm-patented Face Of Fatigue. What's your guess?

end fb3.Name: Kai
end fb3.Text: I'll come with. I want to see if you're right.

end fb4.Name: Elm
end fb4.Text: (But that confirms it. One of the men in the flashbacks is Mr. Diaz!)

end fb4.Name: Elm
end fb4.Text: (If I keep this up, maybe I can figure out what really happened to him.)
